featured.text: Then as commercial air travel became popular in the 1950s and airplanes began flying higher and faster, three planes mysteriously broke apart in midair.
The skydiver managed to land safely after jumping out of the aircraft, even though her _____ failed to open in midair.

definition.zh_def: 在空中，通常指飛行或懸浮的狀態。
definition.en_def: In the air, typically referring to a state of flying or floating.
definition.example: The bird caught its prey midair.
